## TaskOptions.hooks property

The preset hooks of the corresponding `task`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
hooks: Partial<Hooks>;
```

## Remarks

We can adjust this prop by invoking [TaskOptions.setHooks()](./processor.taskoptions.sethooks.md)<!-- -->.
